diagonal edge note the first and last stitch can be difficult to find make certain to pick up 16 sts per color shape 64 sts row 2 ws k2tog k to end of row row 3-32 repeat row 2 a total of 30 times 33 sts shape 6 row 33-64 switch to color 6 continue repeating row 2 a total of 32 times 1 sts pull yarn through to bind off weave in ends being mindful of notes for sewing blocks together about yarn needed for seams make a total of 16 blocks figure 4 for shape 5 pick up and knit stitches along diagonal edge ©sonia savoulian 2025 page 4 of 7 color mosaic notes for sewing blocks together don t worry about matching the seaming yarn color with the shapes the seam will be hidden in the garter ridges i suggest a couple approaches for assembling the blanket one method is to sew the blocks together individually leave a tail of about 24 at the beginning of colors 3 and 5 in each block this method allows for immediate seaming but will result in weaving the seaming yarn into a different colored shape a second approach is to first join the four blocks in each corner then sew these sections together along the long center seams leave a 30 tail at the beginning of color 5 in eight blocks yellow blue pink and green lines in the image below these are the four corners to be seamed first leave a 60 tail when beginning color 3 for the one block in the bottom center and one block in the middle right of the blanket red lines in the image below use the same color yarn for shape 3 in one of the center blocks on both the top and bottom of the blanket do the same for shape 3 in one of the middle blocks on both the left and right sides in my project these are the light brown colored shapes this allows the seam yarn to be woven into a same color shape this method takes more planning but seam yarns will be woven into same colored shapes figure 5 blanket seams ©sonia savoulian 2025 page 5 of 7 color mosaic border when picking up stitches along diagonal row of garter stitch use this convention pick up a stitch in two consecutive ridge edges then pick up a stitch in the space between two ridges refer to instructional video for picking up stitches along diagonal garter edge in techniques section
